item.title: FAQ
item.description: Question Index: Where can I find you across the web? What languages do you know? What keyboard do you use? What languages do you use for Game Development? Why C? How did you learn to write code? What do you recommend to learn C? What do you think of Rust? Why are you building a game engine for your game?

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: For access to most of these projects, you can go thru the descriptions, or check my GitHub for the relevant repositories! Resume Astera Astera is one of my primary projects currently. It’s a cross platform game library written in C99. The technologies it uses are: C, CMake, GLFW, OpenGL, OpenAL, nanovg, stb image & vorbis, and GLAD. Everything else in the project is self written! It currently builds and runs on Windows, Mac, and Linux!

item.title: Services
item.description: You can find my resume here! Hello! I’m Devon, I work primarily focusing on creating high quality & high performance software. Usually I work on (but am not limited to) the following kinds of projects: Games & Game Engines General & Enterprise Software Full Stack Web & Apps Here are some of the programming languages Iâ€™m most comfortable with: C/C++ Java C# / .NET HTML / CSS JavaScript Python SQL (MSSQL & MySQL) NoSQL BASH / Unix Shell As well as some libraries/technologies I can use:
